      \subsection{NLPD.m}

\begin{par}
\textbf{Summary:} Computes the Negative Log Predictive Density for a multivariate gaussian distribution.
\end{par} \vspace{1em}
\begin{par}
\textbf{Input arguments:}    x			observation    mu			mean vector of the distribution    sigma		covariance matrix of the distribution    d			(optional) dimensionality of input space
\end{par} \vspace{1em}
\begin{par}
\textbf{Output arguments:}    lp			computed NLPD
\end{par} \vspace{1em}


\subsection*{Code} 


\begin{lstlisting}
function [ lp ] = NLPD(x, mu, sigma, d)

    if nargout==3; d = numel(x); end;

    diff = x-mu;
    lp = 0.5*(log(det(sigma)) + diff'*(sigma\diff) + d*1.837877066409345);

end
\end{lstlisting}
